actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Budget and Accounting Act, 1921, to require the advice and consent of the Senate for future appointments to the officers of Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget.

summary.text: Requires the advice and consent of the Senate for future appointments to the offices of Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget under the Budget and Accounting Act of 1921. (Amends 31 U.S.C. 16)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Budget and Accounting Act, 1921, to require the advice and consent of the Senate for future appointments to the officers of Director and Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget.
